messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Mythos Rating?
A measure of the depth of Cthulhu Mythos knowledge contained within each tome
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the role of the Keeper in Mythos?
The Keeper plays the Non-Player Character (NPC)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if players fail their Perception skill rolls?
The Keeper may decide to withhold a clue
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Keeper's role in delivering a clue?
The Keeper may decide that a clue is essential and will simply deliver it to a player
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do players resolve a contest?
Both sides roll and compare levels of success; the higher level of success wins the contest
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of rules are optional in Mythos?
Such rules are available as enhancements or alternatives to the standard rules
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the bonus die applied to subsequent attacks on a character that has fought back or dodged in the present combat round?
One
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can characters and monsters dodge or fight back multiple times before the bonus die is applied?
Yes, that number of times
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How are skill or characteristic rolls affected by the Penalty rule?
By rolling an additional 'tens' percentile die alongside the usual pair of percentile dice
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the type of die used for Percentage, Percentage Dice rolls?
1D100 (percentage)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skills are included in a Perception, Perception Roll?
Spot Hidden, Psychology, Listen, and Track
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can you find more information about applying the bonus die and using the 'tens' die?
On pages 108 and 91, respectively
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What percentage of rolls are used in the game?
1D100 (percentage) rolls
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill rolls can include Perception, Psychology, and Listen?
Spot Hidden, Psychology, and Listen skills
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many skill points can the player spend on desired skills?
INT x 2 skill points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What bonus is gained for firearms attacks made within a fifth of the shooter's DEX in feet?
A bonus die
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is POW in the game?
Power, a Characteristic
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can Pushing be applied to Combat, Chase, Sanity, and Luck rolls?
No, these rolls cannot be pushed
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if a combat roll is pushed?
Combat rolls cannot be pushed (see page 84).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does a character die?
A character cannot die as a result of regular damage (see page 119).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a Regular success?
A Regular success is a result equal to or below the full skill or characteristic value (see page 82).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a character if they fail a Sanity roll?
A failure always costs more and leads toward insanity (see page 154).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a character's Sanity if they lose it?
Through the loss of Sanity points, a character may become temporarily, indefinitely, or permanently insane.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result of a single attack that deals damage less than half the character’s maximum hit points?
The result of any single attack that deals damage less than half the character’s maximum hit points is regular damage (see page 119).
